reviewText: The epitome of most heartfelt romances in K-drama history.  So Jisub and Su Jeong Im create beauty and sweetness in every scene. I have watched 190 k-dramas and this one is still the best. Make sure you pick a DVD set that is at least five to six discs in it otherwise you will be getting a heavily compressed resolution and sound that is probably a bootleg.
I thought All About Eve couldn't be topped but this did! Very well written and very well acted!! Bravo! A+++++
It is a ver good drama,I cried while watching it
